name: Bronze platebody
notes: Basic bronze platebody.

name: Iron platebody
notes: Basic iron platebody.

name: Leather body
notes: Basic ranged body armor.

name: Wizard robe top
notes: Basic magic robe top.

name: Hardleather body
notes: Ranged body armour, requiring 10 defence.

name: Steel platebody
notes: Upgradeable to a Steel platebody(g) or (t) when painted at the Castle Wars armour stand, adding 1 defence bonus.

name: Mithril platebody
notes: Upgradeable to a Mithril platebody(g) or (t) when painted at the Castle Wars armour stand, adding 1 defence bonus.

name: Adamant platebody
notes: Upgradeable to an Adamant platebody(g) or (t) when painted at the Castle Wars armour stand, adding 1 defence bonus.

name: Rune platebody
notes: Upgradeable to a Rune platebody(g) or (t) when painted at the Castle Wars armour stand, adding 1 defence bonus.

name: Granite body
notes: High melee defence body armour that requires 50 defence and 50 strength to equip.

name: Obsidian platebody
notes: High-level melee body armor. Provides a large defence bonus.

name: Dragon platebody
notes: High-level melee body armor. Provides a large defence bonus.

name: Dragon chainbody
notes: High-level melee body armor. Provides a large defence bonus.

name: Carapace torso
notes: Dropped by the Penance Queen. Provides good melee defence and a strength bonus.

name: Fighter torso
notes: Provides a melee strength bonus. Obtained from the Barbarian Assault minigame.

name: Bandos chestplate
notes: High-level melee body armour with strength and prayer bonuses. Dropped by General Graardor in the God Wars Dungeon.

name: Armadyl chestplate
notes: High-level ranged body armour. Part of the Armadyl armour set. Dropped by Kree'arra in the God Wars Dungeon.

name: Karil's leathertop

set_effect.name: Karil's
set_effect.description: When full set is worn has a chance for special attack to deal double damage

notes: Part of the Karil's barrows set. Degrades on use, requires repair.

name: Dharok's platebody

set_effect.name: Dharok's
set_effect.description: For each hitpoint lost, melee damage increases by 1%.

notes: Part of the Dharok's barrows set. Damage increases as health decreases when the full set is worn. Degrades on use, requires repair.

name: Guthan's platebody

set_effect.name: Guthan's
set_effect.description: When full set is worn has a chance to heal equal to the damage dealt.

notes: Part of the Guthan's barrows set. Degrades on use, requires repair.

name: Torag's platebody

set_effect.name: Torag's
set_effect.description: When full set is worn and you are attacked, has a chance to reduce attacker's run energy by 20%.

notes: Part of the Torag's barrows set. Degrades on use, requires repair.

name: Verac's brassard

set_effect.name: Verac's
set_effect.description: When full set is worn has a chance to ignore the target's defence and prayer level.

notes: Part of the Verac's barrows set. Degrades on use, requires repair.

name: Black d'hide body
notes: High-level ranged body armour. Requires 70 Ranged to wear.

name: Red d'hide body
notes: Ranged body armour.

name: Blue d'hide body
notes: Ranged body armour.

name: Green d'hide body
notes: Ranged body armour.

name: Ahrim's robetop

set_effect.name: Ahrim's
set_effect.description: When full set is worn has a chance to increase max hit by 30% but reduce accuracy by 20%

notes: Part of the Ahrim's barrows set. Degrades on use, requires repair.

name: Mystic robe top
notes: Provides a magic attack bonus.

name: Ghostly robe top
notes: Provides a prayer bonus. Part of the Ghostly robes set. Degrades when unequipped.

name: Ancestral robe top
notes: High-level magic robe top, provides magic attack and magic damage bonus. Obtained from the Chambers of Xeric.

name: Dagon'hai robe top
notes: Provides magic attack and magic damage bonus. Dropped by monsters in the Wilderness.
